div.p: Were Men indeed convinced that their health and comfort were so materially dependent upon the regulation of their own Minds, they would be be more careful to strengthen them by Study, and Moderate them by reason, and Confirm them by Religion, and reduce them to an equanimity not easily disturbed by the as and Accidents of Sin. Dec 7th 1890

Tomorrow leads to the Town of Never To deny self, to be meek to be pure in heart to trust Gods Providence Love. Joy. Peace long suffering Kindness goodness faithfulness meekness temperance - can we say there is not a strong line of demarcation between those who bear such fruit and those who dont
